response.overview: Rob (Peter North) has stumbled onto the invention of the century! Who hasn't fantasized about a TV remote control device that can change reality as well as channels?! Well Rob's got such an invention - and he and his buddies are zapping up a storm of hot 'n' sleazy adventures! ZAP! An outrageous encounter with bodaciously endowed Busty Bell. Zap! Gorgeous Carol Cummings turns into an insatiable nympho! Zap! Zap! Zap!!! These studs are horny... and they're having the time of their lives!
response.title: The Love Button
